Metadata.Title: CVE-2026-1642 affecting package nginx for versions less than 1.22.1-15
Metadata.Description: CVE-2026-1642 affecting package nginx for versions less than 1.22.1-15. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package nginx is earlier than 1.22.1-15, affected by CVE-2026-1642
